about_the_game:
Close your eyes and experience the vibes of the spaces between spaces. A lonely park filled with sculptures. A drive during the witching hour with the stars glittering like shimmering specks of sand. A late night train carriage, gently rocking as it travels to its eventual destination.

Music from Glitchhikers: The Spaces Between.
